name: PirateMasters
description:
Pirate Masters

Welcome to pirate masters! When you join the game you enter a beautiful world. You are a crew member of the dangerous pirateboat "Black Horizon". You will have to listen to the captain and complete the tasks he assigns you. 

In this century no one is friendly, so you will have to be aware and cautious! You will have to defend the ship from other pirates at all costs, but don't forget about the tasks!  

And don't forget, falling of the ship won't help you!

Goal

The goal is to get as many points as you possibly can get. Stay alive for as long as you can and complete as many tasks as the captain wants you to. 

Controls

ASWD: Movement

E: Interact

Mousemovement: Aim

Mousebuttons:  Shoot

Package Content:

-  (Beta) Unity Game Build.

Developers:

R. Prins (https://rik-prins.wixsite.com/home/).

T. Hermans (https://thijmenhermans.wordpress.com/).

Artists:

F. van Dijk (https://www.artstation.com/franklinvandijk/).

Information: (Beta) Release date: 14-12-2020.
